quotes.quote: Defense is the first act of war.
The best defense is a good offense.
The best defense is a confusing offense.
A stronger defense is an investment in peace.
Art is our defense against hysteria and death.
The best defense against partisanship is expertise.
The best defense of democracy is an informed electorate.
The best defense against democracy is to distract people.
Defense involves three things: courage, energy, intelligence.
The purpose of education is to teach a defense against eloquence.
The only defense against the world is a thorough knowledge of it.
Your defense will save you on the nights that your offense isn't working.
The core of our defense is the faith we have in the institutions we defend.
Defense wins championships. A good offense is beat by a good defense, always.
Defense is attack, attack is defense, each being the cause and result of the other.
Self-defense...is the only honourable course where there is unreadiness for self-immolation.
My philosophy of defense is to keep the pressure on an opponent until you get to his emotions.
The only defense against evil, violent people is good people who are more skilled at violence.
There is no defense against adverse fortune which is so effectual as an habitual sense of humor.
To me, defense is a mental attitude. It takes will and heart to go out there and lock your man up.
Defense is the stronger form with the negative object, and attack the weaker form with the positive object.
Our defense is not in our armaments, nor in science, nor in going underground. Our defense is in law and order.
The problem in defense is how far you can go without destroying from within what you are trying to defend from without.
Self-defense is not just a set of techniques; it's a state of mind, and it begins with the belief that you are worth defending.
Truth is the best defense.
Innocence is its own defense.
Defense is superior to opulence.
The best defense is not to offend.
The best form of defense is attack.
Self-defense is Nature's eldest law.
Defense can't guard two things in a row.
Defense is a lot more natural to me than offense.
Self-defense is not only our right; it is our duty.
Great defense consists of 3 R's: read, react, and rotate.
The best defense is a well-directed fire from your own guns.
Any defense of common sense must allow that it is revisable.
Defense is one man guarding the ball and four others helping him.
Defense doesn't break down on the help, it breaks down on the recovery.
Adequate defense has been the catchword of every militarist for centuries.
Preparation for defense is an inalienable prerogative of a sovereign state.
The best defense for any group of people is what we do to defend other people.
If you want team play, you must stress defense. Defense makes players unselfish.
The defense of marriage is the defense of freedom. Neither of which is obsolete.
Self-defense is the clearest of all laws, and for this reason: lawyers didn't make it.
To those who don't think defense is important, you'll get the best seat on the bench.
The best defense against terrorism is a strong offensive against terrorists. That work continues.
Defense is a definite part of the game, and a great part of defense is learning to play it without fouling.
